pullrequest.title: Made QFileDialoge open faster by replacing QFileDialog exec_ with getOpenFileNames

content.raw:
Ok, I was just concerned that maybe it wasn't a native file dialog anymore (there was a similar issue when we used GTK instead of Qt a long time ago, and the only solution was to move to a non-native file choosing widget that looked awful!).

I'm happy to have this merged in once @cbillington approves it.
content.html:
Ok, I was just concerned that maybe it wasn't a native file dialog anymore (there was a similar issue when we used GTK instead of Qt a long time ago, and the only solution was to move to a non-native file choosing widget that looked awful!).

I'm happy to have this merged in once @cbillington approves it.
